SummaryText: I'm a self-taught programmer, specialized in frontend solutions development, with background working for startups and tech companies. I have experience with different programming languages and paradigms, especially: JS (ES and TS), Dart, Elixir and PHP.
BiographyText:
I developed my first commercial website when I was 14 years old and started my career working for digital marketing and advertising agencies in Campinas. 
 In 2012 I started to work for tech companies, especially startups and IT consulting. 
 Nowadays, I'm a functional programming enthusiast and even focusing in frontend I also have knowledge and experience with backend, devops and databases.
